Package seng202.team4.controller

Class AirportTabController

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team4.controller.DataController
      • seng202.team4.controller.AirportTabController
  • public class AirportTabController
extends DataController
    Performs logic for the 'Airport' tab of the application Responsible for connecting the airport data to the JavaFX interface, this includes displaying the airports in the JavaFX TableView with data from the 'Airports' SQLite database table and also initialising/updating the additive filtering and searching of said data.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Holds the high level logic (set of instructions) for initialisation. Initialisation order: Table Columns, Make CheckBox Column, Set DataSet ComboBox, Set DataSet Listener, Set Table

      • makeCheckboxColumn

        private void makeCheckboxColumn()
        Adds an extra column, with a checkbox for each airport record, to the table Whenever this checkbox is toggled, the selected airport will be either added or removed from the 'AirportsSelected' database table. This feature enables selected airports to be displayed on the map, on the 'Map' tab

      • setTableData

        public void setTableData​(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Sets the JavaFX table with rows from the 'Airport' database table. This is done using the table query and assigning each record to a row in the table
        Specified by:
        setTableData in class DataController
        Parameters:
        rs - JDBC ResultSet obtained from querying the Database Airport table and is used to set the rows of the JavaFX data table by creating N Airport objects from the query that results in N tuples.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the query fails, throws an exception

      • initialiseComboBoxes

        public void initialiseComboBoxes()
        Sorts the FX observable lists for the country and cities ComboBoxes and uses ControlsFX library to make these ComboBoxes searchable. filterData() is also called here because filtering of the table is based on ComboBox selections and is required to be refreshed whenever a new dataset is chosen to be displayed.
        Specified by:
        initialiseComboBoxes in class DataController

      • filterData

        public void filterData()
        Filtering of table data is done here by initialising then iteratively adding each combobox filter to a FilteredList object. The country and cities filter require addFilter(). Then the search bar filter is added through addSearchBarFilter(). Finally the resulting SortedList is bound to the TableView dataTable and the result of the filtering is shown to the user.
        Specified by:
        filterData in class DataController

      • getNewRecordFXML

        public java.lang.String getNewRecordFXML()
        Override the parent's abstract class as to return the new record FXML file relating to the Airport class.
        Specified by:
        getNewRecordFXML in class DataController
        Returns:
        String the path to the NEW_AIRPORT_FXML file.

      • addFilter

        public javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Airport> addFilter​(javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Airport> filteredList,
                                                                         javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> comboBox,
                                                                         java.lang.String filter)
        Adds a combobox filter, comboBox, to an input FilteredList, filteredList through adding a listener to comboBox (which works with combobox searching as well). The result is a new FilteredList which has the comboBox filter applied.
        Parameters:
        filteredList - the filtered list to add a filter to.
        comboBox - the searchable combobox filter that is added to the filteredList.
        filter - a String parameter used to specify which filter is being applied.
        Returns:
        the FilteredList with the new filter added.

      • addSearchBarFilter

        private javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Airport> addSearchBarFilter​(javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Airport> countryFilter)
        Adds holistic search bar filter which searches the Airport's name, country and it's city.
        Parameters:
        countryFilter - the last filter to be added to before the search bar.
        Returns:
        FilteredList with the search bar filter added.

        public DataType getDataType()
        Returns the 'Airport' datatype specifically used for this controller.
        Specified by:
        getDataType in class DataController
        Returns:
        DataType a new Airport object.
